meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of China.
meanings.sent1: In China, you can buy many things with one yuan.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for yuan at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The yuan in my pocket felt like a lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand yuan.
meanings.sent5: The shiny yuan coin gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A unit of weight in China, equal to about 1.1 pounds.
meanings.sent1: She weighed the fruit using a yuan as a reference.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for half a yuan of flour.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a yuan of feathers felt like carrying a ton.
meanings.sent4: His guilt weighed on him like a heavy yuan.
meanings.sent5: The baby elephant weighed less than a yuan.

meanings.definition: A Chinese dynasty that ruled from 1279 to 1368.
meanings.sent1: The history book mentioned the Yuan dynasty.
meanings.sent2: Emperors of the Yuan dynasty were powerful rulers.
meanings.sent3: Imagine living in the Yuan dynasty with no smartphones!
meanings.sent4: The influence of the Yuan dynasty still lingers today.
meanings.sent5: Stories of the Yuan dynasty fascinated the students.
